definition.zh_def: 一種不會飛的鳥，主要生活在南極及其周邊地區，特徵是黑白相間的羽毛和適合游泳的身體。
definition.en_def: A flightless bird primarily found in Antarctica and surrounding regions, characterized by black and white plumage and a body adapted for swimming.
definition.example: The penguin waddled across the ice in search of food.
